attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All MP expense claims for the last 5 years to be audited independently. Any member shown to have abused the system to be made to pay back (with interest) any funds then to be dismissed from their position and face prosecution for stealing public funds

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
